contest-event.event-date:
April 8, 1985 D Pontins Southport (Championship Section)
Pontins Southport (Championship Section) 0 Test Piece Contest Pontins (Southport) - Qualifiers pontins-southport-championship-section Pontins (Championship Section)
Oceans
Pontins Holiday Centre, Ainsdale Beach, Southport Lewington Yamaha drew No. 1 but arrived late and actually played last. Draw shown reflects actual order of play. Believe Peter Wilson unable to adjudicate and replaced by Derek Broadbent. Prizes - 1st £600 and trophy, 2nd £300, 3rd £200, 4th £150. 13 bands competed. 12th annual contest.
May 22, 2011, 5:56 p.m. Jan. 16, 2015, 10:38 a.m.
1 Lewington Yamaha Trevor Walmsley
2 Point of Ayr Colliery Band Trevor Walmsley
